title: Papa John's Widget
description: Built a widget for the PapaJohns iOS app which shows your current order status and today's offers.

title: GeoViewer
description: GeoViewer allows you to import and browse the most common geodata formats: GPX, KML and GeoJSON.

title: Just Cook
description: Store all your recipes, plan meals and manage your shopping list with Just Cook!

title: Cycle Lane
description: Cycle Lane shows you every TfL cycle route in London on one map.

title: Texaco Rewards
description: Built an App Clip for Texaco which provides a fast, streamlined sign up process for their rewards program.

title: Ecommunity
description: Ever thought your actions for the environment won't make a difference? Ecommunity allows you and your friends to post your good deeds for the environment to motivate each other.

title: Paddle Map
description: Paddle Map helps kayakers navigate over 4,500km of canals and rivers in the UK, including 2,761 locks and weirs.

title: Jack Finnis Art
description: I run my own online art business selling charity Christmas and greeting cards.

title: Norfolk Churches Cycle Route
description: Built an app for the Norfolk tourist board which displays a 2,000 km cycle route around Norfolk's 632 medieval churches.

title: Deloitte Cinema Booking App
description: Researched, designed and built a cinema ticket booking app for iOS.

title: Quick-fire Questions
description: Quick-fire Questions helps students retain the information they learn in class.

title: Machine Learning in R
description: Analysed air quality data using Neural Networks and Principal Component Analysis in R.

title: Complex Fourier Series Visualiser
description: Built an app which trasforms an svg file or image into an epicycle drawing using the complex Fourier series.

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: Conway's Game of Life is a cellular automaton which derives each new state based on a set of rules applied to the current state.

title: MyMap Workout Tracker
description: MyMap shows you all your walks, runs and cycle routes on one map.

title: Moore's Law and the Transistor
description: Researched the most important company that no-one has heard of: ASML.
